price: Ambao husema: Mola wetu Mlezi! Hakika sisi tumeamini, basi tufutie madhambi yetu, na tuepushe na adhabu ya Moto,
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ إِنَّنَآ ءَامَنَّا فَٱغۡفِرۡ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَا وَقِنَا عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ
footnotes: Malipo haya watayapata wale ambao nyoyo zao zimejaa Imani, na wakatangaza kwa ndimi zao wakisema kwa kumnyenyekea Mwenyezi Mungu: Mola Mlezi wetu! Hakika sisi tumeamini kwa kuitikia wito wako. Basi tusamehe dhambi zetu, na utuhifadhi na adhabu ya Moto.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yaqūlūna rabbanā innanā āmannā fa-igh'fir lanā dhunūbanā waqinā ʿadhāba al-nāri
